00011 #define ReadBit(var, bit)                       (((var) & (1 << (bit))) != 0)
00012 #define SetBit(var, bit)                        ((var) |= (1 << (bit)))
00013 #define ClearBit(var, bit)                      ((var) &= ~(1 << (bit)))
00014 #define ToggleBit(var, bit)                     ((var) ^= (1 << (bit)))
00015 
00016 #define Modify(var, mask, value)                (var = ((var & ~mask) | (value & mask)))
